Text: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。
English: Being a tribal people, the Shanyue are unused to the urban and decadent cities of the Han and prefer a life in encamped in the wilderness. Although not nomadic, the hill tribes are nevertheless a more pastoral, agricultural peoples. \\n\\n From their camps, they can both tend to their needs as a people and prepare themselves, militarily, for the ever-present and increasing threat of invasion from the North.
Vanilla: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。
Exact: 山越人乃是部落民族，比較不習慣定居在漢人奢侈委靡的城邑中，而習慣在野外紮營度日。雖然這支山地部族並非遊牧民族，但仍較倚重農牧。\\n\\n此族人在紮營地既可自給自足，也能有效準備兵力，應對北方持續加重的入侵威脅。

Text: 江南一直都是山越族人的家園，他們也希望今後維持不變。這便是他們生存意義所在的真理，也是在諸侯割據的時代，他們必須奮戰保護的傳統。\\n\\n山越人比誰都瞭解南方的山區，並在這嶙峋之地建起了堡壘城寨；這裡遠離殘酷的風雨、也遠離敵人的監視，是他們生活成長之地。
English: The Southlands have long been the home of the Shanyue tribes, and it is their ardent hope that it always will be. This is the truth by which they live, and one they must fight to protect as warlords begin to encroach. \\n\\n The Shanyue know the hills of the South better than any, and amidst the striking scenery, their fortresses rise: places to live and grow, away from both the extremities of the elements and the eyes of the enemy.
Exact: 江南一直都是山越族人的家園，他們也希望今後維持不變。這便是他們生存意義所在的真理，也是在諸侯割據的時代，他們必須奮戰保護的傳統。\\n\\n山越人比誰都瞭解南方的山區，並在這嶙峋之地建起了堡壘城寨；這裡遠離殘酷的風雨、也遠離敵人的監視，是他們生活成長之地。

Text: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」
English: This is our land, our home, our history. You cannot have it!
Vanilla: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」
Exact: 「此處乃我等地盤、我等家園、我等基業。斷不能讓你們奪走！」

Text: 雖然山越人不得不建起柵欄保護自己，但其實他們只想和平度日。
English: Although their palisade walls are an unfortunate necessity, the Shanyue seek only to live in peace.
Vanilla: 雖然山越人不得不建起柵欄保護自己，但其實他們只想和平度日。
Exact: 雖然山越人不得不建起柵欄保護自己，但其實他們只想和平度日。

Text: 授人以魚不如教之以漁。
English: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
Vanilla: 授人以魚不如教之以漁。

English: Coherence in thought and speech brings clear advantage.

Text: 勤勉之人不需命令也會行動。
English: The industrious need no orders to galvanise them into action.
Vanilla: 勤勉之人不需命令也會行動。

Text: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福。
English: Like the weather, one's fortune may change by the evening.
Vanilla: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福。

Text: 修德非一蹴可幾，須時刻培養。
English: Virtue cannot be acquired, only nurtured.
Vanilla: 修德非一蹴可幾，須時刻培養。

Text: 不知其不可為而為者，當能成就大事。
English: With no knowledge of what cannot be done, you will accomplish great things.
Vanilla: 不知其不可為而為者，當能成就大事。

English: The pillar is strongest at its base.
What you do not wish upon yourself, extend not to others.

Text: Those who toil the land require more utilitarian approaches.
English: Those who toil the land require more utilitarian approaches.

Text: This is the basic way to correct corruption.
English: This is the basic way to correct corruption.

Text: All must take up their tools and participate in the enormous effort of rebuilding society.
English: All must take up their tools and participate in the enormous effort of rebuilding society.

Text: 權威帶來的責任絕不能等閒視之。
English: The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.
Vanilla: 權威帶來的責任絕不能等閒視之。

Text: 權威帶來的責任絕不能等閒視之。
English: The responsibility that comes with authority should not be taken lightly.
Vanilla: 權威帶來的責任絕不能等閒視之。

Text: 專注於當下：只管戰鬥，無須思考。活用直覺。
English: Concentrate on the moment: fight, don't think. Use your instincts.
Vanilla: 專注於當下：只管戰鬥，無須思考。活用直覺。

Text: 專注於當下：只管戰鬥，無須思考。活用直覺。

Text: 高強武藝來自勤練。必須孜孜不倦、未雨綢繆、千錘百鍊。
English: Martial expertise from hard work. Practice. Preparation. Endless repetition.
Vanilla: 高強武藝來自勤練。必須孜孜不倦、未雨綢繆、千錘百鍊。

Text: 高強武藝來自勤練。必須孜孜不倦、未雨綢繆、千錘百鍊。
English: Martial expertise from hard work. Practice. Preparation. Endless repetition.
Vanilla: 高強武藝來自勤練。必須孜孜不倦、未雨綢繆、千錘百鍊。

Text: 兵不厭詐，謀如湧泉，則手下士兵無堅不摧。
English: Be cunning and full of tricks and your people shall never be destroyed.
Vanilla: 兵不厭詐，謀如湧泉，則手下士兵無堅不摧。

Text: 兵不厭詐，謀如湧泉，則手下士兵無堅不摧。
English: Be cunning and full of tricks and your people shall never be destroyed.
Vanilla: 兵不厭詐，謀如湧泉，則手下士兵無堅不摧。

Text: 英雄的決心並非裝模作樣，而是發自內心的勇氣。
English: A hero's resolve is not to seem the bravest, but to be it.
Vanilla: 英雄的決心並非裝模作樣，而是發自內心的勇氣。

Text: 英雄的決心並非裝模作樣，而是發自內心的勇氣。
English: A hero's resolve is not to seem the bravest, but to be it.
Vanilla: 英雄的決心並非裝模作樣，而是發自內心的勇氣。

Text: 集結百姓亦是策略之一
English: Motivating men to fight is the essense of leadership.
Exact: 集結百姓亦是策略之一

Text: A decree has arrived from the imperial court. A banquet is to be held, and influential nobles from across China are invited to the imperial palace. Wary of our influence, the imperial protector may be plotting something. However, refusing an imperial decree may have grave consequences...
English: A decree has arrived from the imperial court. A banquet is to be held, and influential nobles from across China are invited to the imperial palace. Wary of our influence, the imperial protector may be plotting something. However, refusing an imperial decree may have grave consequences...

Text: The imperial ancestral rite, a significant event in China, will be held soon. An imperial decree demands that you send civil officials to assist in administrative affairs or military officers for the imperial guard detail. If you fulfill your duties as a faithful servant, the imperial court will grant you grace. If you refuse, you may incurr the emperor's disfavour...
English: The imperial ancestral rite, a significant event in China, will be held soon. An imperial decree demands that you send civil officials to assist in administrative affairs or military officers for the imperial guard detail. If you fulfill your duties as a faithful servant, the imperial court will grant you grace. If you refuse, you may incurr the emperor's disfavour...

Text: A group of unusual men sporting shaved heads disembark from a ship.  They claim to have journeyed from distant lands to spread the teachings of Buddha. Perhaps it will be worth supporting them?
English: A group of unusual men sporting shaved heads disembark from a ship.  They claim to have journeyed from distant lands to spread the teachings of Buddha. Perhaps it will be worth supporting them?

Text: Indeed, the goods brought by the western merchants are diverse, with many rare and valuable items. Furthermore, the mercenaries escorting them look like natural warriors.
English: Indeed, the goods brought by the western merchants are diverse, with many rare and valuable items. Furthermore, the mercenaries escorting them look like natural warriors.

Text: We have contacted the Xiongnu and verified that the kidnapped woman is indeed Cai Yan. She has become the concubine of a Xiongnu chieftain. However, the Xiongnu offer to release Cai Yan for a significant sum of gold.
English: We have contacted the Xiongnu and verified that the kidnapped woman is indeed Cai Yan. She has become the concubine of a Xiongnu chieftain. However, the Xiongnu offer to release Cai Yan for a significant sum of gold.

Text: 經過數個世代，漢王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍飽受各地宣稱帶有天命的軍閥，所帶來的戰亂之苦。主公，您必須終結亂世。天下正等待新的治理規則引導新的團結繁榮與太平盛世。您將如何選擇，治裡天下眾生？
English: After centuries, the old Han Dynasty has finally lost the Mandate of Heaven. Yet the people under heaven still suffer from the chaos of war brought by petty warlords and their false claims to the Mandate. My Lord, you must end this. China awaits a ruler who will bring unity and prosperity to the realm. How will you choose to rule the people of China?
Exact: 經過數個世代，漢王朝失其天命。然而，天下黎民仍飽受各地宣稱帶有天命的軍閥，所帶來的戰亂之苦。主公，您必須終結亂世。天下正等待新的治理規則引導新的團結繁榮與太平盛世。您將如何選擇，治裡天下眾生？

Text: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Yuan Shu's defeat, his generals Zhang Xun, Ji Ling and Yan Xiang to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
English: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Yuan Shu's defeat, his generals Zhang Xun, Ji Ling and Yan Xiang to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.

Text: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Lu Bu's defeat, his daughter Lu Ji seems to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.
English: A shabby warband requests to join your faction. After Lu Bu's defeat, his daughter Lu Ji seems to have been leading the survivors. However, granting them sanctuary may cause their enemies to come after us.

Text: None of the other warlords in China are as noble or accomplished as you are. Bring order to chaos and officers who were once loyal to the Han Dynasty will flock to your banner. Defeat your rivals and accumulate wealth to expand your power.
English: None of the other warlords in China are as noble or accomplished as you are. Bring order to chaos and officers who were once loyal to the Han Dynasty will flock to your banner. Defeat your rivals and accumulate wealth to expand your power.

Text: There's a rumor about a nearby village. Each night, a huge monster terrorises the peasants. The villagers seek a hero to comb the mountains and drive out the beast.
English: There's a rumor about a nearby village. Each night, a huge monster terrorises the peasants. The villagers seek a hero to comb the mountains and drive out the beast.

Text: A few days after you and your men began searching the mountains, you come across an incredible sight. The den of a large white tiger and its family. The men are intimidated by its size and implore you to go back. You feel as if the massive tiger is staring at you.
English: A few days after you and your men began searching the mountains, you come across an incredible sight. The den of a large white tiger and its family. The men are intimidated by its size and implore you to go back. You feel as if the massive tiger is staring at you.
A New Era, A New Ruler.

Text: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.
English: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.

Text: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.
English: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.

Text: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.
English: The markets have been thrown into chaos as townsfolk and merchants scramble to adopt the new currency.

Text: Garrisoned armies will support the administration of the local county.
English: Garrisoned armies will support the administration of the local county.

Text: A new regime is coming into power.
English: A new regime is coming into power.

Text: You rule your domain with military efficiency.
English: You rule your domain with military efficiency.

Text: We are reaping the benefits of military rule.
English: We are reaping the benefits of military rule.

Text: We're barely keeping our cavalry supplied.
English: We're barely keeping our cavalry supplied.

Text: There's a sufficient number of horses.
English: There's a sufficient number of horses.

Text: There's no shortage of good horses.
English: There's no shortage of good horses.

Text: The quantity and quality of your warhorses is unmatched!
English: The quantity and quality of your warhorses is unmatched!

Text: The Black Mountain bandits are scattered.
English: The Black Mountain bandits are scattered.

Text: Though you started with little, you will end with much.
English: Though you started with little, you will end with much.

Text: With these numbers you can accomplish great things.
English: With these numbers you can accomplish great things.

Text: It's getting harder to find anyone who isn't a Black Mountain bandit.
English: It's getting harder to find anyone who isn't a Black Mountain bandit.

Text: [[b]]軍政[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]嚴政方能定亂。[[/col]]
English: [[b]]Stratocracy[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] An inevitable rule to stabilize the turmoil. [[/col]]
Exact: [[b]]軍政[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]嚴政方能定亂。[[/col]]

Text: [[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]劉寵英勇克己，麾下兵士俱受其感召，與皇室為敵者則心懷恐懼。[[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n
English: [[b]]Fortitude[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] With bravery and discipline, Liu Chong inspires his men and puts fear into the enemies of the imperial palace. [[/col]][[/i]] \\n\\n

Text: [[b]]養馬[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Horse Breeding[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Ferghana horses are bred to equip cavalry forces. [[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]養馬[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]養育大宛馬來裝備騎兵部隊。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]黑山[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]黑山贼乘乱以增其之数。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Black Mountain[[/b]] is this faction's unique resource.\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]] Black Mountain bandits exploit the chaos to bolster their numbers. [[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]黑山[[/b]]是此勢力的獨特資源。\\n\\n[[i]][[col:flavour]]黑山贼乘乱以增其之数。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: 消耗軍事物資以穩定佔領的據點。
English: Military supplies were consumed to stabilise the settlement.
Exact: 消耗軍事物資以穩定佔領的據點。

Text: 圍城成功後，我軍奪得了軍事物資補給。
English: These military supplies were pillaged after a successful siege.
Vanilla: 圍城成功後，我軍奪得了軍事物資補給。
Exact: 圍城成功後，我軍奪得了軍事物資補給。

Text: Remnants of Lu Bu's faction have joined us.
English: Remnants of Lu Bu's faction have joined us.

Text: 羌人部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Qiang barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 羌人部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

English: No one will follow a useless emperor. You know that, don't you?

Text: ...分解帝國，以封地的形式分給各地諸侯，他被譽為強大的征服者...
English: ...dividing up the empire, parcelling it out in fiefs to the various kings and marquises, he was hailed as the mighty conqueror...
Exact: ...分解帝國，以封地的形式分給各地諸侯，他被譽為強大的征服者...

Text: 使人民能夠安居樂業與死得其所，無所紛爭，是為王道政治的第一步。
English: Enabling the people to nourish their living and mourn their dead, without any feeling against any, is the first step of the rule of virtue.
Exact: 使人民能夠安居樂業與死得其所，無所紛爭，是為王道政治的第一步。

Text: 山越部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Shanyue barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 山越部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: Powerful white tigers are with us.
English: Powerful white tigers are with us.

Text: 烏桓部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Wuhuan barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 烏桓部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Xiongnu barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 匈奴部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: Gain military benefits at the expense of the relations with other factions.
English: Gain military benefits at the expense of the relations with other factions.

Text: [[b]]宮廷[[/b]]乃是由位居官府要位的人物組成，他們對於您的勢力有深遠的影響。
English: The [[b]]court[[/b]] consists of characters in special government posts that have important effects on your faction.
Vanilla: [[b]]宮廷[[/b]]乃是由位居官府要位的人物組成，他們對於您的勢力有深遠的影響。

Text: [[b]]行政官員[[/b]]是您官府體制中的一個職位。行政官員負責監督一郡的地方官府，同時為其領土提供特定的加成。
English: [[b]]Administrator[[/b]] is a position within your government. An administrator oversees the local government in a commandery and provides certain bonuses to these lands.
Vanilla: [[b]]行政官員[[/b]]是您官府體制中的一個職位。行政官員負責監督一郡的地方官府，同時為其領土提供特定的加成。

Text: [[b]]駐防軍隊[[/b]]是駐紮在城鎮中的軍隊，城鎮遭遇攻擊時，他們會與當地駐軍一同作戰。
English: [[b]]Garrisoned armies[[/b]] are armies stationed in a settlement. These will be defending the city in case of an attack and join the local garrison.
Vanilla: [[b]]駐防軍隊[[/b]]是駐紮在城鎮中的軍隊，城鎮遭遇攻擊時，他們會與當地駐軍一同作戰。

Text: 可透過[[b]]戰鬥勝利[[/b]]，以及對[[b]]敵軍[[/b]]造成比我軍更嚴重的[[b]]傷亡[[/b]]，來提升[[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]。
English: Increase your [[b]]fortitude[[/b]] through [[b]]winning battles[[/b]], and by inflicting greater [[b]]casualties[[/b]] upon [[b]]enemy forces[[/b]] than they inflict upon yours.
Vanilla: 可透過[[b]]戰鬥勝利[[/b]]，以及對[[b]]敵軍[[/b]]造成比我軍更嚴重的[[b]]傷亡[[/b]]，來提升[[b]]堅韌度[[/b]]。

Text: 這些[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]或來自敵軍屍首、或因功獲賞而得，兩者都是此勢力[[b]]積極作戰[[/b]]的回報。
English: Whether from the bodies of fallen enemies, or awarded for gallant behaviour, these [[b]]trophies[[/b]] reward an [[b]]aggressive approach[[/b]] to this faction.
Vanilla: 這些[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]或來自敵軍屍首、或因功獲賞而得，兩者都是此勢力[[b]]積極作戰[[/b]]的回報。

Text: [[b]]戰利品[[/b]]可以陳放於[[b]]戰利品櫃[[/b]]內。每一個陳放的[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]都會提供加成效果。
English: [[b]]Trophies[[/b]] can be displayed in the [[b]]trophy cabinet[[/b]]. Each [[b]]trophy[[/b]] provides a bonus whilst it is on display.
Vanilla: [[b]]戰利品[[/b]]可以陳放於[[b]]戰利品櫃[[/b]]內。每一個陳放的[[b]]戰利品[[/b]]都會提供加成效果。

Text: The finer your horses, the more powerful your cavalry will be.
English: The finer your horses, the more powerful your cavalry will be.

Text: 採取[[b]]紮營[[/b]]姿態的軍隊可以建造更長期的營地。\\n\\n建立更大的城鎮需要耗費[[b]]糧食[[/b]]。
English: [[b]]Encamp[[/b]] is a stance for armies that allow them to set up a more permanent camp.\\n\\n[[b]]Food[[/b]] is used to establish bigger settlements.
Vanilla: 採取[[b]]紮營[[/b]]姿態的軍隊可以建造更長期的營地。\\n\\n建立更大的城鎮需要耗費[[b]]糧食[[/b]]。

Text: [[b]]軍事物資補給[[/b]]讓軍隊得以維持作戰能力，且會對[[b]]補員[[/b]]和[[b]]士氣[[/b]]造成影響。
English: [[b]]Military supplies[[/b]] allow an army to stay in fighting condition and will have an impact on [[b]]replenishment[[/b]] and [[b]]morale[[/b]].
Vanilla: [[b]]軍事物資補給[[/b]]讓軍隊得以維持作戰能力，且會對[[b]]補員[[/b]]和[[b]]士氣[[/b]]造成影響。

Text: As the Black Mountain bandits increase in number, the more brazen they become.
English: As the Black Mountain bandits increase in number, the more brazen they become.

Text: [[b]]黃巾軍[[/b]]勢力被官府視為亂賊，因此一般來說和他們進行外交談判會受到[[b]]重重限制[[/b]]。張燕可以[[b]]增進與黃巾軍的關係[[/b]]，並與他們密切合作。
English: [[b]]Yellow Turban[[/b]] factions are seen as outlaws and diplomacy with them is normally [[b]]restricted[[/b]]. Zhang Yan can [[b]]improve relations[[/b]] with Yellow Turbans and can align himself with them.
Vanilla: [[b]]黃巾軍[[/b]]勢力被官府視為亂賊，因此一般來說和他們進行外交談判會受到[[b]]重重限制[[/b]]。張燕可以[[b]]增進與黃巾軍的關係[[/b]]，並與他們密切合作。

Text: 在[[b]]伏擊戰[[/b]]中，縱列行軍的守方兩翼大開，攻方得以任意選擇出擊的最佳時機。
English: In an [[b]]ambush[[/b]], the defending force is attacked from both sides while marching in column, leaving the attacker to choose the best time to strike.
Vanilla: 在[[b]]伏擊戰[[/b]]中，縱列行軍的守方兩翼大開，攻方得以任意選擇出擊的最佳時機。

English: Reduces the negative influence of the other ethnic groups

Text: [[b]]馬雲祿[[/b]]\\n敦煌公主\\n\\n將領類型：{{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]馬雲祿深知兵在精而不在多，為了部隊執銳披堅她總是不惜血本。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]傭兵哨站[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]附加建築[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]可以僱用傭兵[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 商貿收入\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 補員速率\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]對於沒有顯赫出身的人而言，財富最大的用處就是獲取權力，好讓出身平凡的有志之士亦能為國效力。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Mercenary Outpost[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Add-on building[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]Grants access to Mercenaries[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Income from commerce\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Replenishment\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Without inheriting authority, wealth's greatest use is for attaining power, so the brave can serve China regardless of their heritage.[[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]傭兵哨站[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]附加建築[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]可以僱用傭兵[[/col]]\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 商貿收入\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 補員速率\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]對於沒有顯赫出身的人而言，財富最大的用處就是獲取權力，好讓出身平凡的有志之士亦能為國效力。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]地方豪強[[/b]]\\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]具強大影響力的地方世族。他們可能對你有所助益或傷害。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Local Nobles[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Add-on building[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Available Local Noble units \\n [[col:green]]+[[/col]] Replenishment \\n [[col:red]]+[[/col]] Corruption \\n\\n [[col:flavour]][[i]]The local elites. They can be helpful or harmful to you.[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]校尉部曲[[/b]]\\n\\n袁紹能夠不採用英雄人物，而是以低階軍官與校尉領軍，他們會帶領一群由各種單位組成的部曲。\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]校尉是以與兵卒平等的地位在前方領軍，他們會毫不猶豫地聽從您的命令。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Captain Retinues[[/b]]\\n\\nInstead of heroic characters, House of Yuan can employ lower-ranked officers and captains who lead retinues of various unit compositions.\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Leading their men as first amongst equals, captains will follow your orders without hesitation.[[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]校尉部曲[[/b]]\\n\\n袁紹能夠不採用英雄人物，而是以低階軍官與校尉領軍，他們會帶領一群由各種單位組成的部曲。\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]校尉是以與兵卒平等的地位在前方領軍，他們會毫不猶豫地聽從您的命令。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: [[b]]賣馬[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]經濟任務[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 商貿收入\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]您的隨從會將您所養的馬匹以高價賣出。[[/col]][[/i]]
English: [[b]]Sell Horses[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]Economic assignment[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] Income from commerce\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Your attendant will sell the horses you've bred, for a fine sum.[[/col]][[/i]]
Exact: [[b]]賣馬[[/b]]\\n[[col:scope_description]]經濟任務[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]+[[/col]] 商貿收入\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]您的隨從會將您所養的馬匹以高價賣出。[[/col]][[/i]]

Text: The emperor thinks highly of you. His majesty has decided to gift you a small fortune in honour of your contributions to the state.
English: The emperor thinks highly of you. His majesty has decided to gift you a small fortune in honour of your contributions to the state.

Text: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.
English: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.

Text: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.
English: The imperial ancestral rite was completed successfully, and the emperor shows favour to the attending nobles.

Text: The imperial ancestral rite ended without incident. Unfortunately, the emperor returned to the place without acknowledging your contribution.
English: The imperial ancestral rite ended without incident. Unfortunately, the emperor returned to the place without acknowledging your contribution.

Text: A cowardly conspiracy! There was a failed attempt to assassinate you during the banquet. Unfortunately, the assaliant was slain by the guards before he could be made to reveal the conspirator's identity.
English: A cowardly conspiracy! There was a failed attempt to assassinate you during the banquet. Unfortunately, the assaliant was slain by the guards before he could be made to reveal the conspirator's identity.

Text: Fortunately, nothing of note happened during the banquet.
English: Fortunately, nothing of note happened during the banquet.

Text: Slander! A rival warlord is spreading malicious rumours at the imperial court, causing Emperor Xian to doubt our loyalty to the Han.
English: Slander! A rival warlord is spreading malicious rumours at the imperial court, causing Emperor Xian to doubt our loyalty to the Han.

Text: Perhaps out of admiration or to curry favour, a faction has put in a good word for you with the emperor. Talk of your exploits is is all that is on everyone's lips at the palace of late.
English: Perhaps out of admiration or to curry favour, a faction has put in a good word for you with the emperor. Talk of your exploits is is all that is on everyone's lips at the palace of late.

Text: The yellow turban warband is crushed. Hailing from Qingzhou, the survivors offer their servitude. Cao Cao gathers them under his banner and dubs them Qingzhou Troops.
English: The yellow turban warband is crushed. Hailing from Qingzhou, the survivors offer their servitude. Cao Cao gathers them under his banner and dubs them Qingzhou Troops.

Text: All economic activities have been hampered by the minting of a new coin. We have no choice but to wait for merchants to adjust to the new standard.
English: All economic activities have been hampered by the minting of a new coin. We have no choice but to wait for merchants to adjust to the new standard.

Text: We've run into problems purchasing grain with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for farmers to adjust to the new standard.
English: We've run into problems purchasing grain with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for farmers to adjust to the new standard.

Text: We've run into problems paying the troops with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for soldiers to adjust to the new standard.
English: We've run into problems paying the troops with the new coin. We have no choice but to wait for soldiers to adjust to the new standard.

Text: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.
English: This age of strife breeds men with a talent for warfare. A follower who has recently joined the faction can assume the role of managing an exclusive unit.

Text: 羌人部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Qiang barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 羌人部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 山越部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Shanyue barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 山越部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: After an epic struggle, you slay the enormous white tiger. Then, unexpectedly, the other tigers prostrate themselves as if submitting to your might! These white tigers don't seem to be ordinary beasts.
English: After an epic struggle, you slay the enormous white tiger. Then, unexpectedly, the other tigers prostrate themselves as if submitting to your might! These white tigers don't seem to be ordinary beasts.

Text: You give up the hunt and return. However, for reasons unknown, the monster attacks stopped.
English: You give up the hunt and return. However, for reasons unknown, the monster attacks stopped.

Text: 烏桓部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Wuhuan barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 烏桓部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: 匈奴部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。
English: Cultural friction has caused inter-ethnic conflict between Xiongnu barbarians and Han settlers. The turmoil is pushing many to leave the region.
Exact: 匈奴部落失去掌控。百姓感到不安進而質疑您的治理能力。事情將會好轉，如果您能降低異族的影響。

Text: Zhuge Liang has brilliantly engineered a new weapon. It is a crossbow that fires several bolts simultaneously to overwhelm the enemy.
English: Zhuge Liang has brilliantly engineered a new weapon. It is a crossbow that fires several bolts simultaneously to overwhelm the enemy.

Text: Thanks to your patronage of scholars and men of talent, your officers have made progress on the path to enlightenment.
English: Thanks to your patronage of scholars and men of talent, your officers have made progress on the path to enlightenment.

Text: Sogdians from the west has been spotted entering our borders. We will be able to purchase fine goods or hire Sogd mercenaries soon.
English: Sogdians from the west has been spotted entering our borders. We will be able to purchase fine goods or hire Sogd mercenaries soon.

Text: Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...
English: Your messengers report a remarkable story. A trader spotted a Han woman living amongst the Xiongnu and identified her as Cai Yan, the daughter of the grand scholar Cai Yong. It seems she was forced to marry a chieftain of the Xiongnu. Perhaps someone could convince this chieftain to free Cai Yan. One of your scouts has already left to investigate...

Text: Chunyu Qiong finally came to his senses! He is no longer a drunkard but a general who can lead an army.
English: Chunyu Qiong finally came to his senses! He is no longer a drunkard but a general who can lead an army.

Text: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Danyang troops.
English: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Danyang troops.

Text: We have gathered warriors from nearby nomadic peoples to form a powerful cavalry unit. These formidable cataphracts will crush your enemies.
English: We have gathered warriors from nearby nomadic peoples to form a powerful cavalry unit. These formidable cataphracts will crush your enemies.

Text: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Jingchu troops.
English: You have acquired a tally that grants its bearer the authority to command Jingchu troops.

Text: A Xiliang colonel has joined your faction.
English: A Xiliang colonel has joined your faction.

Text: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.
English: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.

Text: Following your recent success, the captain of the Northern Army has come to pledge his devotion to you. He brings with him the might of the professional soldiers he commands.

Imperial Favour: A Gift from the Emperor

Text: A yellow turban warband has invaded your territory. You must defeat them.
English: A yellow turban warband has invaded your territory. You must defeat them.

Text: The path to prominence in these turbulent times is by the sword! Win battles to demonstrate your capability.
English: The path to prominence in these turbulent times is by the sword! Win battles to demonstrate your capability.

Text: Wars are a costly endeavour and one cannot hope to end this chaos without a sizable treasury. Show all under heaven that you possess China's wealth.
English: Wars are a costly endeavour and one cannot hope to end this chaos without a sizable treasury. Show all under heaven that you possess China's wealth.

Text: Your attendant will sell the horses you've bred, for a fine sum.
English: Your attendant will sell the horses you've bred, for a fine sum.

Text: Your attendant will support your army in enemy territory.
English: Your attendant will support your army in enemy territory.

Text: Your attendant will help to expand the settlement.

Text: Your attendant will replenish the regional army.

Text: Your attendant will assemble volunteers for military service.

Text: Your attendant will manage court affairs, streamlining bureaucracy.
English: Your attendant will manage court affairs, streamlining bureaucracy.

Text: 您的侍中會親自管理郡內所有土木興建，確保所有工程皆以最高效率進行。
English: Your attendant will personally manage all construction projects within the commandery, ensuring that any building endeavours are carried out with maximum efficiency.
Vanilla: 您的侍中會親自管理郡內所有土木興建，確保所有工程皆以最高效率進行。

Text: 您的侍中會販賣多餘存糧，以振興當地市場。

Text: Sword Guards of the Eight Talents
English: Sword Guards of the Eight Talents

Text: 以如震天雷響與其火焰爆破震攝敵軍。
English: Thunderous sounds and exploding flames agitate the enemy.
Exact: 以如震天雷響與其火焰爆破震攝敵軍。

Text: 當在近戰失利時，此單位將引爆自身。
English: These fanatics will blow themselves up when they're in a losing battle.
Exact: 當在近戰失利時，此單位將引爆自身。

English: This unit's arrows spew clouds of deadly gas on impact.

Text: 他們可以在奔跑時進行射擊。
English: This unit can fire on the move.
Exact: 他們可以在奔跑時進行射擊。

Text: 他們可對敵人進行挑釁。
Exact: 他們可對敵人進行挑釁。

English: This unit's weapon allows it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.

Text: 此弓威力非凡。射程雖短，但具穿甲威力。
English: Their heavy metal bows are short-ranged but can pierce through enemies.
Exact: 此弓威力非凡。射程雖短，但具穿甲威力。

Text: 擊射特殊松香油箭，使目標更易焚燒。
English: This unit's sticky rosin arrows cling to their targets, making them vulnerable to flames.
Exact: 擊射特殊松香油箭，使目標更易焚燒。

Text: 此單位可對持盾敵人造成額外傷害。
English: This unit causes extra damage against shielded enemies.
Vanilla: 此單位可對持盾敵人造成額外傷害。

Text: 擊射響箭，驚嚇所經路徑上的敵軍。
English: This unit fires whistling arrows that demoralise enemies along their trajectory.
Exact: 擊射響箭，驚嚇所經路徑上的敵軍。

Text: 這些士兵只順從自己的喜好。他們在戰場上可能會恣意妄為，不聽命令自行進攻！
English: These soldiers obey only their own passions. They may charge without orders and act erratically on the battlefield!
Vanilla: 這些士兵只順從自己的喜好。他們在戰場上可能會恣意妄為，不聽命令自行進攻！
Exact: 有什麼使他們喪失理智。

English: This unit can't shoot very far.

Text: If the year is beyond 195 CE and the emperor token is still in play, then the Imperial Intrigue panel will become unlocked.
English: If the year is beyond 195 CE and the emperor token is still in play, then the Imperial Intrigue panel will become unlocked.

Text: Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.
English: Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.

Text: Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.
English: Each character in Sun Ce's faction grants him shared expertise points once they reach rank 5. At ranks 9, 12 and 15 they generate one extra point respectively.

Text: Unlocked in 195 CE. Once this is unlocked, you can use imperial favour to preform [[b]]imperial decrees[[/b]]
English: Unlocked in 195 CE. Once this is unlocked, you can use imperial favour to preform [[b]]imperial decrees[[/b]]

Text: Unlocked when Emperor Xian comes of age in 195 CE
English: Unlocked when Emperor Xian comes of age in 195 CE

Text: Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents
English: Pike Wall - Ji Guards of the Eight Talents

Text: Shoot some crossbow-bombs for reducing morale of hostile units.
English: Shoot some crossbow-bombs for reducing morale of hostile units.

Text: This hero accosts the enemy hero, shaking them to the core.
English: This hero accosts the enemy hero, shaking them to the core.

Text: This man has a great understanding of geography, and can bend it to their own use.
English: This man has a great understanding of geography, and can bend it to their own use.

Text: This warrior's presence on the battlefield can give hope to his men, even in the most dire of situations.
English: This warrior's presence on the battlefield can give hope to his men, even in the most dire of situations.

Text: This general is as an immovable wall, inspiring his men to stand firm against much greater odds.
English: This general is as an immovable wall, inspiring his men to stand firm against much greater odds.

Text: With a shout, this man spurs on their horse. The warrior can plough into enemies with such force that scores of men go flying.
English: With a shout, this man spurs on their horse. The warrior can plough into enemies with such force that scores of men go flying.

Text: This general rallies the troops to greater feats, inspiring them to make one final effort.
English: This general rallies the troops to greater feats, inspiring them to make one final effort.

Text: The warrior flies into a rage, embodying the mighty Xiezhi, a mythical creature of great power.
English: The warrior flies into a rage, embodying the mighty Xiezhi, a mythical creature of great power.

Text: This shooter fires and fires, faster and faster, never relenting.
English: This shooter fires and fires, faster and faster, never relenting.

Text: 這名英雄指揮若定，鼓舞盟友大顯身手…但他本人並不親赴前線。
English: This general directs and empowers his forces from a… safer distance.
Vanilla: 這名英雄指揮若定，鼓舞盟友大顯身手…但他本人並不親赴前線。

Text: This hero believes you can only kill that which you can catch.
English: This hero believes you can only kill that which you can catch.

Text: With a single shot, The shooter brings death.
English: With a single shot, The shooter brings death.

Text: Cao Cao's presence unnerves the enemy general!
English: Cao Cao's presence unnerves the enemy general!

Text: Cao Cao's presence dampens the enemy's will.
English: Cao Cao's presence dampens the enemy's will.

Text: Born to hold the line, This warrior shrugs off attacks as if they were nothing!
English: Born to hold the line, This warrior shrugs off attacks as if they were nothing!

Text: 兵士們集結於此英雄的麾下。
English: Soldiers gather under the banner of this hero.
Exact: 兵士們集結於此英雄的麾下。

Text: 當受害者有所意識，情勢早已難以挽回。
English: There's something about this strike that just feels off.
Exact: 當受害者有所意識，情勢早已難以挽回。

Text: Send your warriors into the thick of battle and watch as they fight even more fiercely.
English: Send your warriors into the thick of battle and watch as they fight even more fiercely.

Text: 劉備的軍團的成員皆長年共處的夥伴，對彼此充滿了信念。
English: Years of fighting have solidified the faith these soldiers have in each other.
Exact: 劉備的軍團的成員皆長年共處的夥伴，對彼此充滿了信念。

Text: 驅逐這些人是非常困難的。
Exact: 驅逐這些人是非常困難的。

Text: 火勢越猛，持燒之時越短。
English: The light that burns twice as bright burns half as long.
Exact: 火勢越猛，持燒之時越短。

Text: 這樣的話語會帶來羞愧與恥辱。
English: These words will bring shame and humiliation.
Vanilla: 這樣的話語會帶來羞愧與恥辱。
Exact: 這樣的話語會帶來羞愧與恥辱。

Text: 飽含怒火的一擊，令周遭敵人無不搖晃欲倒。
English: A furious strike that sends anyone nearby reeling.
Vanilla: 飽含怒火的一擊，令周遭敵人無不搖晃欲倒。
Exact: 飽含怒火的一擊，令周遭敵人無不搖晃欲倒。

Text: 熟知戰場的人即使面對最有把握的士兵，也能動搖他們的自信。
English: A master of the battlefield can undermine even the surest of soldiers.
Vanilla: 熟知戰場的人即使面對最有把握的士兵，也能動搖他們的自信。
Exact: 熟知戰場的人即使面對最有把握的士兵，也能動搖他們的自信。

Text: 軍隊將跟隨你 ... 永遠的。
English: The Force will be with you... always.
Exact: 軍隊將跟隨你 ... 永遠的。

Text: By the time the victim is aware of what has happened, it is already too late.
English: By the time the victim is aware of what has happened, it is already too late.

Text: 郭嘉能明鑑古今，洞察未來。
English: This man can see all that was, and all that will be.
Exact: 郭嘉能明鑑古今，洞察未來。

Text: 士氣高昂時，他們渴望擊敗敵人。
English: Some care not for their own personal safety and so work themselves into a whirlwind of destruction and mindless violence!
Exact: 士氣高昂時，他們渴望擊敗敵人。

Text: 在一次大屠殺中，很高興有人仍願意成為你的依靠。
English: In the midst of a bloodbath, it's nice to know that someone has your back.
Exact: 在一次大屠殺中，很高興有人仍願意成為你的依靠。

Text: Distracts the focus of enemy ranged troops.
English: Distracts the focus of enemy ranged troops.

Text: In the face of adversity, those left standing will close ranks and bolster their resolve.
English: In the face of adversity, those left standing will close ranks and bolster their resolve.

Text: 以非凡的觀察力縱觀戰場。
English: A look at the battlefield with remarkable insight.
Exact: 以非凡的觀察力縱觀戰場。

Text: 對自己有信心，戰士才能完全發揮實力。
English: A warrior will only fight at their best when they are sure-footed.
Vanilla: 對自己有信心，戰士才能完全發揮實力。
Exact: 對自己有信心，戰士才能完全發揮實力。

Text: 荀彧是位有能輔佐帝王之士，沒有人會懷疑這一點。
English: Xun Yu has the power to influence the emperor. No one doubts his reputation.
Exact: 荀彧是位有能輔佐帝王之士，沒有人會懷疑這一點。

Text: 他們已達成自我修練的目標。
English: They push the limits of the human body.
Exact: 他們已達成自我修練的目標。

Text: 這樣的話語能強化心靈。
English: These words will fortify the spirit.
Vanilla: 這樣的話語能強化心靈。
Exact: 這樣的話語能強化心靈。

Text: 他們將粉碎阻擋他們的一切；或一死。
English: They'll smash anything in their way. Or die.
Exact: 他們將粉碎阻擋他們的一切；或一死。

Text: A moment's respite from battlefield to heal our troops.
English: A moment's respite from battlefield to heal our troops.

Text: 無人能快過這吞嚥的速度。
English: No one is faster than this one.
Exact: 無人能快過這吞嚥的速度。

Text: 此人精神如猛虎，在沒有偉大的勇氣支持下無人膽敢面對此人。
English: His spirit is like a tiger. It takes great courage to face him.
Exact: 此人精神如猛虎，在沒有偉大的勇氣支持下無人膽敢面對此人。

Text: 此人的傳奇風采使敵人望而卻步。
Exact: 此人的傳奇風采使敵人望而卻步。

English: Carefully approach and go for the throat.

Text: Fan the flames of war with inextinguishable anger.
English: Fan the flames of war with inextinguishable anger.

Text: Organise your troops into a solid wall to deter horses. It's a simple but effective tactic.
English: Organise your troops into a solid wall to deter horses. It's a simple but effective tactic.

Text: 保護馬匹免於投射兵器的攻擊。
English: Armour protects precious warhorses from enemy projectiles.
Exact: 保護馬匹免於投射兵器的攻擊。

Text: 下一擊將更為精準且更有殺傷力。
English: With each volley their shots become ever more powerful and accurate.
Exact: 下一擊將更為精準且更有殺傷力。

Text: 黑山盜匪們有非常特別的情誼連結。當他們與同夥聚在一起時，勇氣倍增。
English: The Black Mountain bandits share a special bond. Together, their boldness knows no bounds.
Exact: 黑山盜匪們有非常特別的情誼連結。當他們與同夥聚在一起時，勇氣倍增。

English: No one dares to challenge this warrior's skill with the blade.

Text: They becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.
English: They becomes frenzied when blood is spilled.

Text: Reassuring words prevent soldiers from wavering on a chaotic battlefield.
English: Reassuring words prevent soldiers from wavering on a chaotic battlefield.

Text: 「你也許不勇敢，但只要大家在一起就勇氣倍增。」
Exact: 「你也許不勇敢，但只要大家在一起就勇氣倍增。」

Text: 從一名戰士傳達到另一名戰士的戰鬥口號。
English: A war cry from one warrior to another.
Vanilla: 從一名戰士傳達到另一名戰士的戰鬥口號。
Exact: 從一名戰士傳達到另一名戰士的戰鬥口號。

Text: 命令不易實行但也不可不從。
English: This general's orders are absolute and cannot be refused, no matter how unreasonable they may be.
Exact: 命令不易實行但也不可不從。

Text: 組成無隙可乘的防禦陣行。
Exact: 組成無隙可乘的防禦陣行。

Text: 當面臨戰鬥時，他們將越戰越勇。
English: Bring the fight to them and they will hold their ground.
Exact: 當面臨戰鬥時，他們將越戰越勇。

English: Bring the fight to them and they will hold their ground.

Text: 能激勵人的不見得是命令的內容，也可能是發號施令的方法。
English: It is not always the command that motivates, but the way it is given.
Vanilla: 能激勵人的不見得是命令的內容，也可能是發號施令的方法。
Exact: 能激勵人的不見得是命令的內容，也可能是發號施令的方法。

Text: I have no choice but to pretend that I am a warrior who knows no fear.
English: I have no choice but to pretend that I am a warrior who knows no fear.

Text: 是說，情況最差之時，最好把火燒至最旺。
English: The flame of hope shines bright in the darkest hour.
Exact: 是說，情況最差之時，最好把火燒至最旺。

English: A merciless order, for Dong Zhuo's men and his enemies.

English: Their energy is like a dragon.

Text: They excel as warriors having trained in martial disciplines.
English: They excel as warriors having trained in martial disciplines.

Text: The Black Mountain bandits make their move.
English: The Black Mountain bandits make their move.

Text: 瞭解最佳的放箭時機，在輪到自己挨箭時便能收到奇效。
English: There is nothing to fear because the heaven is watching.
Exact: 瞭解最佳的放箭時機，在輪到自己挨箭時便能收到奇效。

Text: Ride, ride to ruin and the world's ending!
English: Ride, ride to ruin and the world's ending!

Text: 此人相信，要將敵人除之而後快，就必須先追得上敵人。
English: This hero believes you can only kill that which you can catch.
Exact: 此人相信，要將敵人除之而後快，就必須先追得上敵人。

English: It's not a good place for a beautiful woman to stay.

Text: 泰山匪徒發現某些植物燃燒時所冒的煙霧對人體有害。
English: The bandits of Taishan discovered how to create thick, rolling smoke by burning certain plants. It's also toxic.
Exact: 泰山匪徒發現某些植物燃燒時所冒的煙霧對人體有害。

Text: 保護馬匹免於投射兵器的攻擊。

Text: 當在戰場上與英雄對抗或決鬥時，他們會發現自己的技能與戰力得到相當程度的增強。

Exact: 當在戰場上與英雄對抗或決鬥時，他們會發現自己的技能與戰力得到相當程度的增強。

Text: A special arrow containing a toxic substance.
English: A special arrow containing a toxic substance.

Text: 畢生學習天道，便能將想法化為信念。

Exact: 畢生學習天道，便能將想法化為信念。

Text: 有時重點不在打中了什麼、打得多用力，而是打在哪裡。

Text: The typical bandit force consists of lightly armored troops. These men are not a typical bandit force. A string of victories or lucky looting has netted them the excellent armour wielded by the heavy troops of the Han empire. They now form a heavy spear unit, capable of holding their ground against even the dreaded barded horsemen. With these men, any aspiring bandit warlord may find himself a bandit king or queen, one day.

A string of victories or lucky looting has netted them the excellent armour wielded by the heavy troops of the Han empire. They now form a heavy spear unit, capable of holding their ground against even the dreaded barded horsemen. With these men, any aspiring bandit warlord may find himself a bandit king or queen, one day.

Text: Whereas some cavalry bring a primal, instantly shattering force to the battlefield, other mounted warriors are suited to the slower burn, embroiling themselves in the melee and staying to continue inflicting casualties. \\n\\n Whilst they get less power on the charge, their destructive capability increases dramatically once they begin hacking away at foes.
English: Whereas some cavalry bring a primal, instantly shattering force to the battlefield, other mounted warriors are suited to the slower burn, embroiling themselves in the melee and staying to continue inflicting casualties. \\n\\n Whilst they get less power on the charge, their destructive capability increases dramatically once they begin hacking away at foes.

Text: Move swift as the Wind and closely-formed as the Wood. Attack like the Fire and be still as the Mountain. \\n\\n These elite soldiers hail from Danyang province and are rapidly gaining renown with commanders in the crumbling Han empire. Armed with a glaive and heavy armor, they have gathered a reputation assaulting enemy strongpoints succesfully and routing their defenders. \\n\\n Already, enemies have learned to fear their expertise, as well as the gunpowder bombs they carry with them. When the Blue Turbans have been spotted on the field, the foe knows their days are numbered.
English: Move swift as the Wind and closely-formed as the Wood. Armed with a glaive and heavy armor, they have gathered a reputation assaulting enemy strongpoints succesfully and routing their defenders. \\n\\n Already, enemies have learned to fear their expertise, as well as the gunpowder bombs they carry with them. When the Blue Turbans have been spotted on the field, the foe knows their days are numbered.

Text: Recruited by Liu Bei during his time as "General of the Left", these soldiers now are loyal to their general and will fight to see his vision fulfilled. The Han shall be restored, and they will unleash a barrage of arrows upon any rebel who would see the Han extinguished. And And if their foes would close the distance, they shall find that they are equally skilled in melee combat, unless they fight cavalry.
English: Recruited by Liu Bei during his time as "General of the Left", these soldiers now are loyal to their general and will fight to see his vision fulfilled. The Han shall be restored, and they will unleash a barrage of arrows upon any rebel who would see the Han extinguished. And And if their foes would close the distance, they shall find that they are equally skilled in melee combat, unless they fight cavalry.

Text: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm.\\n\\n These particular soldiers are armed with crossbows, allowing them to barrage the enemies of the Han relentlessly with volley after volley of armour-piercing bolts. Should the enemy cavalry think to charge, they are in for an unpleasant surprise: these warriors also wield spears and shields and will not hesitate to strike down any horseman who comes too close!
English: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm.\\n\\n These particular soldiers are armed with crossbows, allowing them to barrage the enemies of the Han relentlessly with volley after volley of armour-piercing bolts. Should the enemy cavalry think to charge, they are in for an unpleasant surprise: these warriors also wield spears and shields and will not hesitate to strike down any horseman who comes too close!

Text: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm. \\n\\n Gifted with fine armor from their prince, these soldiers expertly wield their halberds in defence of the Han. Advancing on their foe as a disciplined unit, they are a living reminder to the greatness of the Han.
English: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Advancing on their foe as a disciplined unit, they are a living reminder to the greatness of the Han.

Text: Even as the Han crumbles, embers of its glory remain. These warriors serve the prince of Chenliu, Liu Chong. Clad in gold-lacquered armor, they form a resplendiscent sight on the battlefield, reminding all that the fortunes of the Han have not yet faded while these men stand firm. \\n\\n These royal guards are a beacon of hope to their allies. Gifted with fine steeds to ride, and clad in the heaviest armour availible from the princely armouries, each man has been trained in a myriad of weapons, from crossbow to the noble Jian sword and shield and is a veteran of many battles.

Gifted with fine steeds to ride, and clad in the heaviest armour availible from the princely armouries, each man has been trained in a myriad of weapons, from crossbow to the noble Jian sword and shield and is a veteran of many battles.

Text: The jian is a straight, double-edged sword known as the 'Gentleman of Weapons', and considered to be one of the four major weapons alongside the gun, dao and qiang. It takes a year of training before one is considered competent enough to use it, and so only the most skilled swordsmen are equipped with it. \\n\\n The role of the Elite Swordsmen is to hold the line against enemy attacks, and their swordsmanship, heavy armour and gourd shields enable them to do this long after others have fallen to exhaustion.
English: The jian is a straight, double-edged sword known as the 'Gentleman of Weapons', and considered to be one of the four major weapons alongside the gun, dao and qiang. It takes a year of training before one is considered competent enough to use it, and so only the most skilled swordsmen are equipped with it. \\n\\n The role of the Elite Swordsmen is to hold the line against enemy attacks, and their swordsmanship, heavy armour and gourd shields enable them to do this long after others have fallen to exhaustion.

Text: A heavy bow made of iron is not easy to use for ordinary archers. \\n\n The range is rather short due to the strong tension and heavy arrowheads, but the arrows will penetrate the enemy. \\n\n This unit is heavily armed with ironclad, and in close combat, it cuts enemy troops with direct distribution.
English: A heavy bow made of iron is not easy to use for ordinary archers. \\n\n The range is rather short due to the strong tension and heavy arrowheads, but the arrows will penetrate the enemy. \\n\n This unit is heavily armed with ironclad, and in close combat, it cuts enemy troops with direct distribution.

Text: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Atop their steeds, they patrol the countryside, putting down any opposition with bow and sword.
English: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Atop their steeds, they patrol the countryside, putting down any opposition with bow and sword.

Text: Zheng Jiang has selected her most ferocious bandits to act as her ‘Fists of the Bandit Queen’; their role is to act as shock-troops, sneaking behind enemy lines to terrify foes with surprise attacks early in the battle. \\n\\n Each carries a heavy fu axe in each hand, and the wounds dealt by them can be catastrophic. Striking terror requires these troops to be without fear themselves, but also means they can tend to be undisciplined and difficult to control once their blood is hot with battle
English: Zheng Jiang has selected her most ferocious bandits to act as her ‘Fists of the Bandit Queen’; their role is to act as shock-troops, sneaking behind enemy lines to terrify foes with surprise attacks early in the battle. \\n\\n Each carries a heavy fu axe in each hand, and the wounds dealt by them can be catastrophic. Striking terror requires these troops to be without fear themselves, but also means they can tend to be undisciplined and difficult to control once their blood is hot with battle

Text: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley. \\n\\n Serving the heirs of Sun Tzu, these men would willingly follow them into heirs and certain death. Armed with a light glaive and medium armor, these men can hold their own in a variety of situations, facing down cavalry or infantry with equal skill. Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.

Their versatility has caused them to be fondly called “problem solvers” by their commanders and are given great respect, which they repay with loyalty.

Text: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Skilled archers, these men provide covering fire for their army as they maneuver nimbly into the most advantageous positions. They should be protected from cavalry however, as they are lightly armoured.
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Skilled archers, these men provide covering fire for their army as they maneuver nimbly into the most advantageous positions. They should be protected from cavalry however, as they are lightly armoured.

Text: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Long axes are intimidating to behold, especially in the hand of such a warlike people. Rending shields and armor alike, they are known to be good shock infantry that echo the glory of their ancient dynasty.
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Long axes are intimidating to behold, especially in the hand of such a warlike people. Rending shields and armor alike, they are known to be good shock infantry that echo the glory of their ancient dynasty.

Text: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Wielding spear and shield, these soldiers form a defensive screen for their army against calvary charges. Their armor is lighter than most other armies, but this makes them more mobile: many horsemen have been taken off-guard by a sudden rush of Jingchu Spearmen!
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n Wielding spear and shield, these soldiers form a defensive screen for their army against calvary charges. Their armor is lighter than most other armies, but this makes them more mobile: many horsemen have been taken off-guard by a sudden rush of Jingchu Spearmen!

Text: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n These warriors bring caltrops to battle, stunting any enemy advance as the foe perishes on the unseen traps. Any survivors are quickly dealt with by the blades these warriors wield. A skilled general would be wary of archers though: they are lightly armored and carry no shield.
English: Heirs of the old dynasty of Chu, the soldiers bred by this land share its temperament: fierce in battle and loyal to the end. They are a fitting fighting force for any warlord or would-be emperor. \\n\\n These warriors bring caltrops to battle, stunting any enemy advance as the foe perishes on the unseen traps. Any survivors are quickly dealt with by the blades these warriors wield. A skilled general would be wary of archers though: they are lightly armored and carry no shield.

Text: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the bandit of the king of Black Mountain, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the bandit of the king of Black Mountain, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.

Text: With the many wars that ravage China, militias everywhere have sprung up to defend their home and livelihood from bandits, yellow turbans, and invading warlords. Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.
English: With the many wars that ravage China, militias everywhere have sprung up to defend their home and livelihood from bandits, yellow turbans, and invading warlords. Tempered by hard-won experience, these men have become adepts at war by survival.  Equally skilled in melee as with the bow, they over time bought horses to level the playing field with the more professional troops they often face. Many of these veterans now flock to the banners of the warlords, providing a rapid response force fit for a variety of situations.

Text: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the self-proclaimed bandit queen, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.
English: The Yellow Turban rebellion and the rapidly collapsing Han dynasty has left many people without homes or livelihoods. The most desperate or least scrupulous of these turn to banditry. These men flock to the self-proclaimed bandit queen, hoping to remake their fortunes through plunder and bloody battle. Despite their hopes, their poor equipment usually has them end up as fodder, while others reap the rewards for their sacrifices.

Text: Born from refugees and those peoples who would not submit to the Han empire, these White Tiger Strays have thrown their lot with Yan Baihu, hoping to safeguard their independance. Wearing bad equipment, the most valuable thing they offer to their commanders is their lives; to sell dearly as better men win the battle for them.
English: Born from refugees and those peoples who would not submit to the Han empire, these White Tiger Strays have thrown their lot with Yan Baihu, hoping to safeguard their independance. Wearing bad equipment, the most valuable thing they offer to their commanders is their lives; to sell dearly as better men win the battle for them.

Text: The nomads of the steppes have a reputation for fine horsemanship. These particular horse archers have turned to banditry and pillaging to fill their coffers. They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.
English: The nomads of the steppes have a reputation for fine horsemanship. These particular horse archers have turned to banditry and pillaging to fill their coffers. They will allign themselves to bandit chiefs of note, who can afford their services by giving them a proportional share of the loot. In battle, they harass the enemy from afar, using their horses to quickly wheel about when the counter-attack comes.

Text: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding sword and shield and clad in heavy armor, they can easily weather a barrage of arrows, before charging into melee and remaining there to hold the line as the rest of the army finishes the enemy.
English: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding sword and shield and clad in heavy armor, they can easily weather a barrage of arrows, before charging into melee and remaining there to hold the line as the rest of the army finishes the enemy.

Text: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding a long spear and shield, these armored warriors charge into battle, skewering the foe with their lances. They only need to be wary of enemy spearmen and sustained archer fire.
English: The fame of these horsemen reaches far. To fight the northern tribes, Gongsun Zan has created a skilled cavalry force of his own to match. These warriors follow their leader into battle, against the tribes or any other foe of the Han… \\n\\n Wielding a long spear and shield, these armored warriors charge into battle, skewering the foe with their lances. They only need to be wary of enemy spearmen and sustained archer fire.

Text: Having fled from their homes, these craftsmen and artisans turn their skills to the defence of their new home and master. \\n\\n Having been selected as the brightest from the many refugees flooding his lands, these engineers serve Tao Qian to the best of their ability. Wielding crossbows, they provide support from afar and will deploy smoke bombs and caltrops when an enemy strays too close. However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.
English: Having fled from their homes, these craftsmen and artisans turn their skills to the defence of their new home and master. \\n\\n Having been selected as the brightest from the many refugees flooding his lands, these engineers serve Tao Qian to the best of their ability. Wielding crossbows, they provide support from afar and will deploy smoke bombs and caltrops when an enemy strays too close. However, these men are not proper soldiers and should not be relied upon to hold the line in melee.

Text: The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.
English: The bandit queen's forces are bolstered by the presence of these so-called "phantoms". Hailing from Taishan, these warriors have already gathered an ominous reputation for the poison bombs they carry with them. If the wind is right, these bombs will cause entire regiments to choke without even comitting to battle. They are furthermore armed with a light sword and cloth armor, so they should not be relied on to hold the line in melee.

Text: Hailing from Taishan, these women have coated their arrow points in a special ointment, made from poisonous herbs native to the region. In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. A wise commander will use these soldiers to spread terror through the enemy ranks, yet keep them well-protected: they are vulnerable to cavalry, as their range is limited.
English: Hailing from Taishan, these women have coated their arrow points in a special ointment, made from poisonous herbs native to the region. In battle, A volley from these archers will soon leave the enemy gasping for air as the poison very quickly spreads through their veins. A wise commander will use these soldiers to spread terror through the enemy ranks, yet keep them well-protected: they are vulnerable to cavalry, as their range is limited.

Text: Sun Tzu said that one should always give an enemy room to escape, so that they do not fight with the fervour of the doomed. Yet for Gao Shun's elite force, Xian Chen Ying, being entirely surrounded is nothing but another dimension to slaughter. \\n\\n Renowned for their abilitiy to smash through enemy formations, Xian Chen Ying excel even when surrounded. The bodies will pile high, but Xian Chen Ying will still emerge from the pile victorious.
English: Sun Tzu said that one should always give an enemy room to escape, so that they do not fight with the fervour of the doomed. Yet for Gao Shun's elite force, Xian Chen Ying, being entirely surrounded is nothing but another dimension to slaughter. \\n\\n Renowned for their abilitiy to smash through enemy formations, Xian Chen Ying excel even when surrounded. The bodies will pile high, but Xian Chen Ying will still emerge from the pile victorious.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Armed with crossbows, these soldiers rain down a hail of armour-piercing missiles on their foes. A wise general will support them with spearmen, as they are a prime target for enemy horsemen.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Armed with crossbows, these soldiers rain down a hail of armour-piercing missiles on their foes. A wise general will support them with spearmen, as they are a prime target for enemy horsemen.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These spearmen protect the flanks by pre-empting charges and bracing their qiang spears at an angle, so only the most foolish or brave cavalry dare charge them. This makes them a target for missile attacks, so they are outfitted in leather armour and carry large shields to protect themselves from the expected rain of arrows.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These spearmen protect the flanks by pre-empting charges and bracing their qiang spears at an angle, so only the most foolish or brave cavalry dare charge them. This makes them a target for missile attacks, so they are outfitted in leather armour and carry large shields to protect themselves from the expected rain of arrows.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Imitating the tactics of the tribes they often face, these horse archers are proficient hit-and-run combatants. They will strike where the enemies are weakest, while remaining out of reach of all weapons, save arrows or crossbow bolts.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Imitating the tactics of the tribes they often face, these horse archers are proficient hit-and-run combatants. They will strike where the enemies are weakest, while remaining out of reach of all weapons, save arrows or crossbow bolts.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. After having thrown a spare hand-ji, these men will charge the enemy line, swinging their dagger-axes in one hand while the other holds a shield to parry retaliatory blows.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. After having thrown a spare hand-ji, these men will charge the enemy line, swinging their dagger-axes in one hand while the other holds a shield to parry retaliatory blows.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These soldiers, armed with the long Ji, will brace and hold against cavalry charges, letting the horse impale itself on their blades. Wearing iron armour, they will wade into the melee confidently and take on all comers.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n These soldiers, armed with the long Ji, will brace and hold against cavalry charges, letting the horse impale itself on their blades. Wearing iron armour, they will wade into the melee confidently and take on all comers.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Swift horsemen, they can easily catch any enemy left out in the open, while their swords and shields will allow them to stay in melee for a while before having to retreat.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. \\n\\n Swift horsemen, they can easily catch any enemy left out in the open, while their swords and shields will allow them to stay in melee for a while before having to retreat.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. Skilled horsemen such as these will ride the enemy down in a devastating charge and retreat before the enemy can launch a counterattack, or pepper them with arrows.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n The courageous and experienced Xiliang army is the envy of most warlords and the pride of its leaders. Skilled horsemen such as these will ride the enemy down in a devastating charge and retreat before the enemy can launch a counterattack, or pepper them with arrows.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These crossbowmen are anti-cavalry specialists. Even the powerful nomadic cataphracts shun them.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These crossbowmen are anti-cavalry specialists. Even the powerful nomadic cataphracts shun them.

Text: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make an example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Skilled with both the bow and the sword, they habitually patrol the streets to put down any unrest.
English: If only strength can rule, then strength must be displayed often and in great abundance. And it must be used to make an example of fools who would believe otherwise. \\n\\n Trained in the Xiliang style of warfare, these disciplined warriors form the backbone of the ironfisted rule that Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu impose upon the Han. Skilled with both the bow and the sword, they habitually patrol the streets to put down any unrest.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These spearmen, clad in iron armor and wielding great shields, will hold the frontline of any army and drive the enemy back.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These spearmen, clad in iron armor and wielding great shields, will hold the frontline of any army and drive the enemy back.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. Armed with the two-handed zhanmadao, these warriors can bring any cavalry charge to a brutal standstill and make short work of their foes afterwards.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. Armed with the two-handed zhanmadao, these warriors can bring any cavalry charge to a brutal standstill and make short work of their foes afterwards.

Text: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These warriors, clad in heavy armor and riding equally armoured steeds, are the best the Xiliang have to offer. Though slow in maneuvers, almost none can oppose them as they charge into enemy ranks, trampling and goring their enemies on their spears.
English: In order to live in the shadow of the great wall and the tribes of the steppe, a people must learn to cope with hardship and discipline. Its soldiers must learn doubly so and are the better for it. \\n\\n Every army has their elites: those of the Xiliang army are more so than most. These warriors, clad in heavy armor and riding equally armoured steeds, are the best the Xiliang have to offer. Though slow in maneuvers, almost none can oppose them as they charge into enemy ranks, trampling and goring their enemies on their spears.
